English version in below

◎時間：2025年01月31日 – 2025年02月15日

◎地點：日本 長崎大學

◎費用：270,000 日幣 （不包含餐費、機票、保險、交通費及其他個人花費）

◎報名截止時間：2024.11.14

◎報名流程

1.填寫google 表單向國際處報名，同時繳交以下文件：

Google form：https://reurl.cc/2jAzQ9

*在學證明
*家長同意書
*JLPT日語測驗證明 (曾經考過此測驗的話)

2.由國際處進行提名後，再提供申請連結

其餘事項務必詳細查看簡章。

注意事項：

1. 每個級別僅有兩個名額，先報先得，請提供語言能力證明以利推薦級別。
2. 未曾參加過JLPT測驗者，將推薦至入門班。
3. 國際處僅公告或協助本校學生報名參加簽約校的短期活動或課程，其短期課程是否可抵免本校學分，參加學生需遵照教務處相關規定辦理。若活動日期為本校學期上課期間，學生須依照本校規定自行辦理請假手續。

English version

◎Period： January 31~ February 15 , 2025

◎Location：Nagasaki University, Japan

◎Fee：270,000 JPY（Not included in this fee are meals, airfare, traveler’s insurance, transportation and daily expenses. ）

◎Registration Deadline：2024.11.14

1.Sign up via google form and upload below documents to OIA.

Google form：https://reurl.cc/2jAzQ9

*Student Status Certificate
*Parental Consent Letter
*JLPT Score Certificate (if you have taken it before).

2. After the nomination by OIA, the application link will be provided.

For further information, please visit their website and check out their brochure.

Please note:

1. There are only TWO quotas available in each level of course. The course operates on a first-come, first-served basis. Please provided proof of language proficiency to facilitate the recommendation.
2. Those who have not taken the JLPT will be recommended to the Introductory level.
3. The OIA only announces or assists our school’s students in registering for short-term activities or courses offered by contracted schools. Whether credits from these short-term courses can be transferred to our school is subject to the regulations of the Academic Affairs Office, and participating students must comply accordingly. If the activity falls within our school’s academic semester, students must follow our school’s regulations to apply for leave of absence.
